about_the_game:
Journey through the desolate stretches of Mile High City, a former bustling metropolis now overtaken by foliage and vertical forests. Your guides are broken robots that you must revive, each harboring fragmented memories that piece together the puzzle of humanity's mysterious disappearance. Through environmental storytelling, players explore a world that has moved on without humans, where robots serve as the final custodians of civilization's legacy. This solitary quest weaves a poignant narrative about Earth's future past and the final destiny of its lost inhabitants.

Setting

Mile High City, filled with mile-high skyscrapers and skyways, now abandoned for centuries - possibly millennia - and bearing no signs of human life.

Protagonist

A lone robot left to explore the city, seeking to understand what happened to its creators.

Core Mechanics

  • Exploration - Navigate the city's foliage-covered skyways and skyscraper exteriors, discovering clues, resources, and hidden secrets.
  • Survival - Manage energy, repair damage, and overcome environmental challenges.
  • Storytelling - Uncover lore, interact with remnants of the past, and piece together the narrative.
  • Environment Utilization - Skyscrapers hold clues and secrets to the city's past, each with unique features and challenges.

short_description: Play as a lone robot exploring a post-human world where nature has overtaken cities of towering skyscrapers. Unearth the forgotten legacy of your creators by reviving your sole companions - long dormant, malfunctioning robots - each holding a key to both the past and humanity's fate.
